pressor and chronotropic responses to bilateral carotid occlusion ( bco ) and tyramine were also markedly reduced following treatment with ~~[[1 methyldopa 1]]~~ , which is consistent with the clinical findings that chronic methyldopa treatment in ~~[[2 hypertensive 2]]~~ patients impairs cardiovascular reflexes .
